scripts.build:site: mkdir -p build/site && npx resumed render resume.json --theme jsonresume-theme-even -o build/site/index.html && cp -r static/ build/site/
scripts.build:html: mkdir -p build && npx resumed render resume.json --theme jsonresume-theme-even -o build/resume.html
scripts.build:pdf: mkdir -p build && npx resumed export resume.json --theme jsonresume-theme-even -o build/resume.pdf
